title: Israeli airstrike on school housing displaced people kills 28, medics say
author: Mohamad El Chamaa, Heba Farouk Mahfouz
byline: By Bryan Pietsch, Molly Hennessy-Fiske, Joshua Partlow, Lori Rozsa and Joanna Slater

text: Linda Kling of Bradenton, Fla., stands in front of her damaged home on Thursday. (Thomas Simonetti for The Post)
